section.title: Introduction
section.para: Since 2003 the Chair of Software Engineering at the ETH Zurich teaches “Introduction to Programming” for their first semester students following the ideas of the Inverted Curriculum. It builds around a large piece of software which includes a tool called Traffic. Traffic consists of the Traffic library, as well as some example applications.
In this guide I will try to explain how to get your first Traffic example application running and help you create your own Traffic application.
